overview_of_class: To understand the issues involved in community integration for people labeled disabled and to discuss how our actions and behaviors communicate to others our perspectives about incorporating marginalized individuals into community life. We will be examining local integration initiatives, the representation of disability by the media, the influence of language, stories from family, friends, and the roles of the educational and social service systems.
name: Community Integration of Labeled People
title: SoC COMM_ST 340-0-20 Community Integration of Labeled People
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Sophomores, Juniors, and Seniors from every undergraduate school only.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: To understand the issues involved in community integration for people labeled disabled and to discuss how our actions and behaviors communicate to others our perspectives about incorporating marginalized individuals into community life. We will be examining local integration initiatives, the representation of disability by the media, the influence of language, stories from family, friends, and the roles of the educational and social service systems.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Course Pack and four paper back books.

subject: COMM_ST
